sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: SCORCHING WILDFIRES IN THE SOUTH, DESTRUCTIVE STORMS IN THE NORTH.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: EMERGENCY SERVICES BATTLE THE EFFECTS OF CLIMATE CHANGE ACROSS ITALY.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: AS LOCALS CLEAR THE RUBBLE IN ODESSA AFTER RUSSIAN SHELLING, FIGHTING CONTINUES ACROSS BAKHMUT, LIMAN AND AVTIVKA.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: AMID THE POLITICAL CHAOS, COULD SPAIN'S PRIME MINISTER PEDRO SANCHEZ REALLY FORM A NEW GOVERNMENT WITH A CATALONIAN Amid the political chaos, could Spain's Prime Minister Pedro Sanchez really form a new government with a Catalonian separatist party?

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: The battle against wildfires raging across southern Italy continues.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: Firefighters are doing what they can, but the flames are being fanned by high winds and scorching temperatures.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: are doing what they can, but the flames are being fanned by high winds and scorching temperatures. Overnight 15 people had to be evacuated from towns outside Palermo and Sicily, suburbs threatened by encroaching flames. They could be seen carrying luggage and being escorted by Italian Air Force personnel and firefighters with an inferno in the distance. The destructive In the distance. The destructive nature of these fires is all too obvious, but they have also turned deadly.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: Emergency services were unable to reach an 88-year-old woman who had fallen ill on the island due to the flames.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: And more than 200 people in Palermo have reportedly sought medical attention for smoke inhalation. On Tuesday, a blaze surrounded Palermo airport.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: It was forced to close for safety reasons.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: But with temperatures rising to 47 degrees Celsius, the tarmac melted and flights were cancelled.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: And while southern Italy burns, violent storms have lashed the north of the country.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: Hail, strong winds and heavy rains have hit the Italian provinces of Milan, Varese and Brescia, causing the collapse of many large trees and flooding streets.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: Public transport was hit with widespread damage and breakdowns.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: Without enough seats on either the left or the right, could Catalonia's pro-independence La propuesta que hace Junts por Cataluña es muy clara, es el ejercicio del derecho a la autodeterminación. per organitzar un referèndum de la independència il·legal a Catalunya.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: Pot ser possible que Puigdemont acti com a cap de rei, però el primer ministre Pedro Sánchez ha sempre reg regulado ayudar a los separatistas cataloneses. Junts no tiene tantos incentivos para formar o para forzar una coalición con PSOE y sumar.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: Pero el domingo, el Oficio de Prosecutores Público pidió que la ley de arrestos internacional de Puigdemont se reactivara, haciendo que pareciera menos probable. El plazo para constituir las Cortes es el próximo 17 de agosto. Se inicia así la nueva legislatura.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: Pero en España no existe un plazo legal específico para investir al presidente, por lo que las negociaciones podrían alargarse semanas.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: Cristina Giner, E the two pilots on board. The plane had just dropped water on a fire when it hit a hillside. The Ministry of Defence said they

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: were pilots from the Greek Air Force.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: The accident happened near the town of Christos on Tuesday and was captured by a camera crew from ERT state television. At least three other aircraft and around 100 firefighters were working nearby. Fires have broken out on other islands, including Rhodes and Corfu, as the country endures a ninth day of extreme temperatures. The dryness of the ground and high winds has made them much worse. The Prime Minister, Kyriakos Mitsotakis, said on Tuesday that we have a difficult summer ahead of us, as his cabinet was meeting to discuss the fires.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: The wildfires are still raging across the island of Rhodes out of control. Desperate residents have watched as flames approach their homes while firefighting planes and helicopters are dropping water on them. A third successive heat wave is pushing temperatures και να προσθέσουν νερό. Ένα τρίτο συνεργασμένο θερμοκρασία προσθέτει θεήθησαν πάρα πολύ στη φωτιά να αποκτήσει πάρα πολύ μεγάλη ένταση, να αναπτύξει πάρα πολύ μεγάλα θερμικά φορτία και αυτό οδήγησε τελικά στην έκρηξή της.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: Και λέγοντας έκρηξη εννοούμε ότι ξαφνικά η φωτιά αποκτώντας όλη αυτή την ένταση αρχίζει να εξαπλώνεται ραγδαία και να εμφαν επίσης ένας φακτός. Μετά την ώρα, η βελτιωτική συμμετέχει και όταν σκοτεινάει, είναι υπέροχη.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: Φυσικά, οι εξωτερικές φύλες δεν μπορούν να βγουν υπό κοντρό, λέει ο Γιονάρος.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Όλα που μπορούν να κάνουν είναι να ευακουραντήσουνκαγιές, αγκρέζασικές πυρκαγιές, που μπορεί να καταλήξουν και να γίνουν μεγαλύτερες πυρκαγιές, δεν αντιμετωπίζεται.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Και αυτό δεν αφορά μόνο την Ελλάδα, αλλά οποιονδήποτε δασοποιητικό μηχανισμό στον κόσμο.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Αυτό που μπορούμε να κάνουμε είναι να επενδύσουμε φυσικά στην πρόληψη, γι' αυτό μπορούμε να μιλήσουμε με πιο αναλυτικά συνάδελφοι δεσολόγοι.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: Ωστόσο, στο κομμάτι της ετοιμότητας και της καταστολής, μπορούμε να αξιοποιήσουμε επιστημονικά εργαλεία, τα οποία υπάρχουν ήδη διαθέσιμα. vehicles and seven planes.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: Death Valley in California, the hottest place on Earth.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: The extreme heat may be a mere curiosity for these tourists, but for others on this planet it is life-changing and even life-threatening.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: The fingerprints of climate change are all over the intense heat waves gripping the globe this month.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: That's the conclusion of World Weather Attribution, a research group comprised of international climatologists that released their findings on Tuesday.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: It found that our atmosphere, having been warmed by carbon dioxide and other gases for decades, has made the current European heat wave 2.5 degrees Celsius hotter and the one in the United States and Mexico 2 degrees hotter.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: Using tree rings and other data sources, the report says this month's heat is likely the hottest Earth has been in about 120,000 years, easily the hottest of human civilization.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: In China, the report found that greenhouse gases has increased the possibility of heat waves by a factor of 50.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: And everywhere the heat waves will be more intense, more frequent and last longer.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: It's a cocktail that not only disrupts human lives, but is behind other weather-related disasters such as droughts and wildfires.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: And since industry began burning greenhouse gases, the world has warmed by 1.2 degrees.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: The jury has delivered its verdict over the terror attacks at the Brussels airport and metro station in March 2016 that killed 32 people.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: There are 10 defendants, among them Salah Abdel-Slam, who is already serving a life sentence in France over his role in the attacks that hit Paris in 2015.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: The suspects were tried on charges including murder, attempted murder and participation in the acts of a terrorist group.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: The biggest trial in Belgium's judiciary history unfolded over more than a half a year.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Sentencing will be decided in a separate process in September. If convicted, some could face up to 30 years in prison.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: After seven months of hearings and the jury spending the last 19 days locked together in isolation deliberating, the verdict is out. But families and victims will still have to wait a couple of weeks longer until they hear the precise sentences to give all those involved in this highly emotional, gruelling trial a long break.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: Maeve McMahon, Euronews, Brussels.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Residents of Odessa clear rubble after Russian strikes on the city.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: The total damage has yet to be assessed.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: In the coming days, UNESCO representatives will arrive in the region for inspection of the cultural heritage sites affected by the attacks.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: On Tuesday, Ukrainian Commander Oleksandr Suritsky visited combat brigades in the Bakhmut and Liman directions to adjust military plans.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: According to the briefing by Kyiv, active fighting continues in these areas, as well as Avdivka.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Meanwhile, Russia's lower house, the Duma, passed an amendment extending the age for military call-up to include citizens from 18 to 30 years old.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Previously, military service was compulsory up to 27 years old.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: The Duma also drafted laws on penalties for failure to appear for military service.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Fines will increase tenfold.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Meanwhile, Russia's Ministry of Defense says its army has pushed back several Ukrainian advances in the Donetsk region.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Chinese Foreign Minister Ching Gan has been relieved of his duties, according to state media.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: No further explanation was provided.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: In office since the end of December 2022, Mr. Chin has not been seen since the 25th of June.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Since then, he missed several diplomatic events, including a major meeting of the Association of Southeast Asian Nations in Indonesia around early July.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: The Chinese Ministry of Foreign Affairs justified Ching Gan's absence on the grounds of health reasons.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: But that was not enough to quieten online rumours and speculation of his whereabouts.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Mr Chin has been replaced by his predecessor, Wang Yi.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Over the past month, in Ching Gan's absence, Wang Yi was already fulfilling some of the duties of the now ex-minister.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: One year to go and the Olympic torch has been unveiled in Paris. With much flair and with the help of athletics great Usain Bolt, Paris 2024 President Tony Estanguet and International Olympic Committee Chief Thomas Bach presented the torch for all to see.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: Crafted by French designer Mathieu Le Haineur, the torch encapsulates the spirit of 2024 guided by three central themes, equality, water and tranquility. It will be carried by 11,000 people and will then embark on a historic journey across France covering thousands of kilometers passed from hand to hand in the spirit of unity and celebration. The final destination is of course in Paris for the lighting of the Olympic cauldron during the Games opening ceremony on July 18th.
